# What we do

* Advanced statistical modeling

* Predictive analytics

* Custom data science applications and software tools

* Dynamic reporting processes

:::

::::

<br>

::: {.column-body style="text-align:center"}

### Guided by what works

We combine a pragmatic problem-solving approach with flexible, open-source data science tools like [R](https://www.r-project.org/about.html), [Python](https://www.python.org/about/), [Shiny](https://shiny.posit.co/) and [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) to tailor analyses and solutions to the heart of the problem, adding complexity and rigorous statistical considerations as needed. These principles apply in research and business contexts.

:::

<br>

::: divider
:::

::: {.column-body}
